channel.title: [317] Original Runescape [317]
channel.description:
[center][b]Client Base-[/b] Delta scape v16 [b]Source base[/b]- Blank Source
[u][font=trebuchet ms]Coding[/font][/u] [b]20%[/b] Deltascape [b]70%[/b] me [b]10%[/b] Tyler[/center]
[center]I have been working on this client & source for about a week now and ive gotten very far with coding.[/center]
[center][b][u]- Melee System -[/u][/b]
100% dragon dagger's 100% Whip emote. 100% melee following 100% melee bonuses (no overpowered weapons)
[center][b][u]- Mage system -[/u][/b]
100% auto-cast 100% Barrage 100% mage following 100% ancient timers 100% normal magic 100% magic bonuses (working on lunar) (No overpowered spells)
[center][b][u]- Range System -[/u][/b]
100% range following 100% arrows 100% range bonuses (no overpowered arrows/bows)
[center][b][u]- Npc System -[/u][/b]
100% No flinching 100% Npc clipping 100% Thieving 100% Npc attack
[center][b][u]- Quests -[/u][/b]
(I have only posted the completed ones F2P only)
Dragon Slayer Doric's quest Goblin Diplomacy Cooks assistant Black nights fortress
[center][b][u]- Client -[/u][/b]
100% original runescape background with moving flames
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/25zrmur.jpg[/img]
[center][b][u]- Future developments -[/u][/b]
100% dueling (working on it atm) Possibly add in more items E.G. god swords Finish Lunar (almost complete)
[size=36pt]Please No flaming I did not leech
[size=36pt]I might possibly Release the Client & source later on but for now I am coding Or i may possibly start a server. [/size]
I will release pictures soon of pking, skilling, quests ETC.

item.title: [317] Original Runescape [317]
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:8, topic:343354"][quote author=my pker link=topic=439748.msg3233972#msg3233972 date=1276329491]
Dude i got the client base & source base from delta scape it was BLANK i simply just made it into an almost perfected version of 317 , I get 70% credits because i coded almost everything there.
[/quote]
If it’s DeltaScape - it’s crammed with fucking horribly written shit. Uselessly repeated methods which do the same thing. Horribly re-named to the point it just encourages lazy programming.

If you find a “clean” DeltaScape - I guarantee it’s winterLove.

@Your sig.
You claim to of mastered 317s - though only halfway through 459/462/474/484?

You do realize that unless the 400+ are written in a different programming language - it’s the same fucking shit, right?

You do not “master” one, yet fail to master the other.[/quote]
I was about to post exactly that, I now love you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Original Runescape [317]
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

Is your server’s name really “Original Runescape”? If so, you’ll probably have some legal issues to deal with…seeing as Jagex has copyrights to “RuneScape”.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Original Runescape [317]
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

`jeba:

You do realize that unless the 400+ are written in a different programming language - it’s the same fucking shit, right?

Unless its one of those shit 474 sources released years ago, then you would be wrong. The 474s that are written are Hyperion.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Original Runescape [317]
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

my pker:

Dude i got the client base & source base from delta scape it was BLANK i simply just made it into an almost perfected version of 317 , I get 70% credits because i coded almost everything there.

If it’s DeltaScape - it’s crammed with fucking horribly written shit. Uselessly repeated methods which do the same thing. Horribly re-named to the point it just encourages lazy programming.

If you find a “clean” DeltaScape - I guarantee it’s winterLove.

@Your sig.
You claim to of mastered 317s - though only halfway through 459/462/474/484?

You do realize that unless the 400+ are written in a different programming language - it’s the same fucking shit, right?

You do not “master” one, yet fail to master the other.
